testsuite.name: FlashcardsTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Input the number of cards: > 2 The card #1: > black The definition of the card #1: > white The card #2: > white The definition of the card #2: > black Print the definition of "black": > white Correct! Print the definition of "white": > blue Wrong. The right answer is "black". askLines: Print the definition of "black": Correct! Print the definition of "white": Wrong. The right answer is "black". ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Input the number of cards: > 5 The card #1: > a The definition of the card #1: > a The card #2: > 2 The definition of the card #2: > 2 The card #3: > 3 The definition of the card #3: > 3 The card #4: > 4 The definition of the card #4: > 4 The card #5: > 5 The definition of the card #5: > 5 Print the definition of "a": > a Correct! Print the definition of "2": > 2 Correct! Print the definition of "3": > 3 Correct! Print the definition of "4": > 4 Correct! Print the definition of "5": > 5 Correct! askLines: Print the definition of "a": Correct! Print the definition of "2": Correct! Print the definition of "3": Correct! Print the definition of "4": Correct! Print the definition of "5": Correct! ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Input the number of cards: > 5 The card #1: > 1 The definition of the card #1: > 1 The card #2: > 2 The definition of the card #2: > 2 The card #3: > 3 The definition of the card #3: > 3 The card #4: > 4 The definition of the card #4: > 4 The card #5: > 5 The definition of the card #5: > 5 Print the definition of "1": > 5 Wrong. The right answer is "1". Print the definition of "2": > 4 Wrong. The right answer is "2". Print the definition of "3": > 3 Correct! Print the definition of "4": > 2 Wrong. The right answer is "4". Print the definition of "5": > 1 Wrong. The right answer is "5". askLines: Print the definition of "1": Wrong. The right answer is "1". Print the definition of "2": Wrong. The right answer is "2". Print the definition of "3": Correct! Print the definition of "4": Wrong. The right answer is "4". Print the definition of "5": Wrong. The right answer is "5". ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m Input the number of cards: > 4 The card #1: > 11 The definition of the card #1: > 21 The card #2: > 12 The definition of the card #2: > 22 The card #3: > 13 The definition of the card #3: > 23 The card #4: > 14 The definition of the card #4: > 24 Print the definition of "11": > 21 Correct! Print the definition of "12": > 22 Correct! Print the definition of "13": > 333333 Wrong. The right answer is "23". Print the definition of "14": > 34 Wrong. The right answer is "24". askLines: Print the definition of "11": Correct! Print the definition of "12": Correct! Print the definition of "13": Wrong. The right answer is "23". Print the definition of "14": Wrong. The right answer is "24". ?[1;31m Start test 5?[0m Input the number of cards: > 2 The card #1: > a brother of one's parent The definition of the card #1: > uncle The card #2: > a part of the body where the foot and the leg meet The definition of the card #2: > ankle Print the definition of "a brother of one's parent": > ankle Wrong. The right answer is "uncle". Print the definition of "a part of the body where the foot and the leg meet": > ?? Wrong. The right answer is "ankle". askLines: Print the definition of "a brother of one's parent": Wrong. The right answer is "uncle". Print the definition of "a part of the body where the foot and the leg meet": Wrong. The right answer is "ankle".
